授業目的:
Title: Diverse environmental problems around the world
Through this course, you will understand how climate is changing on what impact everyone's consumption has on the deteriorating state of our environment.
We will look at diverse topics such as marine pollution (from plastic), fast fashion's impact on the climate, e-waste (such as our old phones) and water pollution, palm oil and deforestation, among many others.
You will learn how governments, NGOs, companies and civil society is responding to environmental destruction, and assess their actions and policies.
到達目標:
You will understand how many environmental issues apart from global warming we have to deal with, and learn what has been done to tackle these issues.
You will acquire different soft skills, such as discussion skills, research skills, critical thinking and presentation skills.
While the lectures are give in English, you can do your presentations and final exam in Japanese.
